interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jade Roller for Face,Anti-aging Jade Roller Massager Eye Jade Facial Roller for Women Puffiness, Real Jade 100% Natural Herbivore Jade Facial Roller Jade Stone Roller Set with Gua Sha Tool,Case,Pouch
Review Date: 2018/12/07
Store: OYOROL
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.2 x 0.59 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '799392612136'}
Review Text: I never thought I would like these.  I mean, come on a roller for your face?  But I admit I was wrong.  The first few times were pleasant.  I used them to spread my face oil around but I read that it's much better if it's cool.  I put it in the fridge for an hour and OMG!  Total turnaround.  The bags under my eyes shrunk a bit but it feels so much better.  I don't see the cosmetic changes but the coolness against my face after a long day at work.  Two thumbs up.
Review Title: Jade Roller for Face
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Leave In Conditioner with Almond Milk, Aloe Butter and Shea Oil for Extremely Damaged Hair, 8 fl oz Carol's Daughter ['Reverses Damage'] {'Brand': "Carol's Daughter", 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Damaged, Coily', 'Product Benefits': 'Repairs Damage, Strengthens and Protects Hair, Restores Softness for Over-Processed Hair', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 7.49 inches; 9.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'K4268600', 'UPC': '820645235120 755332169061', 'Manufacturer': "Carol's Daughter"} My daughter has very, very thick wavy blonde hair. Not colored or processed. We've been using another conditioner in a primarily African American line but she didn't like the smell (coconut). This one has won her over completely. After she gets out of the shower, she puts a dime size dab in hand and coats her hands and then start at the ends works her way to the roots.

There is no residue and it washes out completely the next time so there are no flaky specs. Carols Daughter Almond Milk Restoring Conditioner Green Goo Natural Skin Care for Eczema, Psoriasis, Cracked Hands and Feet, Black, Dry Skin, 1.82 Ounce Green Goo {'Brand': 'Green Goo', 'Scent': 'Dry Skin', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': '*Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Flower Extract, *Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Oil, *Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, *Sambucus Nigra (Elder) Flower, *Trifolium Pratense (Red Clover) Flower., Vitamin_e*Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Flower Extract, *Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Oil, *Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, *Sambucus Nigra (Elder) Flower, *Trif… See more', 'Unit Count': '1.82 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GOO-05690', 'Department': 'Unisex-adult', 'Date First Available': 'April 22, 2016', 'Manufacturer': 'Green Goo'} I got this because of a persistent dry spot on my neck and ear for over a year . The doctor said it was eczema and prescribed an ointment. Didn't help. I must have tried everything over the counter in the beauty aisle and health. Tried this as a last resort and bam! Within two days of four times a day, the dry spots were gone. Thanks!! Green Goo Dry Skin Large Tin Jade Roller for Face,Anti-aging Jade Roller Massager Eye Jade Facial Roller for Women Puffiness, Real Jade 100% Natural Herbivore Jade Facial Roller Jade Stone Roller Set with Gua Sha Tool,Case,Pouch OYOROL {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.2 x 0.59 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '799392612136'} I never thought I would like these. I mean, come on a roller for your face? But I admit I was wrong. The first few times were pleasant. I used them to spread my face oil around but I read that it's much better if it's cool. I put it in the fridge for an hour and OMG! Total turnaround. The bags under my eyes shrunk a bit but it feels so much better. I don't see the cosmetic changes but the coolness against my face after a long day at work. Two thumbs up. Jade Roller for Face
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preference:** Maintains a focus on products for extremely damaged, curly, and coily hair types.
- **Ingredients Sensitivity:** Prefers natural ingredients across beauty categories, with a notable inclination towards repair and restoration, as seen in recent skincare purchases.
- **Usage Habits:** Demonstrates a mindful approach to application techniques, carefully applying products from ends to roots, indicative of a thoughtful regimen in hair and skincare.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** Dislikes strong scents, specifically coconut, favoring subtle or pleasant aromas that enhance the user experience.
- **Family-Centric:** Prioritizes family needs, choosing hair care solutions that cater to her daughter's thick wavy hair, reflecting a nurturing approach to consumer decisions.
- **Efficacy Valuation:** Values products that are effective, leave no residue, and are easy to wash out, emphasizing cleanliness and health in her routines.
- **High Ratings Preference:** Inclined towards high-rated products, specifically those with 5-star ratings, illustrating a strong focus on quality based on user feedback.
- **Skeptical to Open-Minded:** Recently embraced new skincare tools, demonstrating a willingness to explore innovative methods for enhancing her skincare routine, particularly appreciating the cooling effects for relaxation and minor cosmetic benefits.

Overall, the user showcases a commitment to effective, family-friendly solutions with natural ingredients, pleasant aromas, and an openness to innovative beauty practices that align with her established preferences.
